blockchain.name: Broken Vault
blockchain.desc:
My friend told me everything is public on the blockchain, I don't believe him, so I put my key in it. Can you find it?

blockchain.name: Vulnerable Token
blockchain.desc:
Ottersec has reported that this token is vulnerable. But I don't see how... Can you exploit it to get the flag?

Note: This challenge has a special $50 first blood prize

crypto.name: Connorsmith Returns

Exponents shaped the message. The ring twisted it. You're left with the echoes.

Author: Swizzer

forensic.name: Baby Corruption
forensic.desc:
Catch me if you can, Scan me if you can!

Author: Azadin

forensic.name: Execution
forensic.desc:
I don’t know what happened to my system something feels off. I might be compromised! As a digital forensics expert, can you help me figure out what’s going on?

1- Provide the MITRE ATT&CK technique ID used by the attacker.

2- Provide the IP:PORT of the C2 .

Note: Do NOT open the reg file on your machine.

Flag Format: QnQSec{Txxxx.xxx_IP:PORT}

Author: 0xS1rx58

hw.name: Not your Karnaugh diagram
hw.desc:
Give the proper function as a binary string where the bottom line is the MSB of the string and the top line is the LSB, challenge files linkedin below:

flag format: QnQSec{1111 1111 1111 1111} (binary)

Author: Labyad

hw.name: SmartCoffee
hw.desc:
A firmware update introduced unexpected behavior to a SmartCoffee device. Investigate the firmware image for a hidden secret.

Author: Azadin

misc.name: Catch Me
misc.desc:
TYou can look all day, but can you catch it before it slips away?

Author: x.two

misc.name: HeartBroken
misc.desc:
I wrote a farewell letter to Rima and signed it, but I am suspecting someone tampered with my signature, help huh?

Author: Carthica

misc.name: John Cena
misc.desc:
Misc/Stegno
You Can't See Me!

Author: x.two

misc.name: Laser Strike
misc.desc:
Misc/OSINT
During a recent night patrol, a police helicopter was struck multiple times by a laser beam coming from the ground. Unfortunately, they were not able to get a clear picture, and the GPS coordinates shown on the aircraft’s display has been removed. What remains is a single frame of the incident.

Your task is to determine the exact location from which the laser was pointed. Submit in LAT,LON format rounded to 4 decimal places.

Example Flag: QnQSec{12.3456N,98.7654W}

Author: x.two

misc.name: Rain and Fire
misc.desc:
Misc/Stegno
The storm rages. The fire crackles. Somewhere in the chaos, a message is waiting.

Author: x.two

misc.name: Timelock
misc.desc:
Your grandpa gave you some coins, but you cannot spend them for 10 years. Can you hack and spend them today?

Author: x0rc1ph3r

misc.name: callmeback
misc.desc:
An attacker can steal all the funds in the CallMeBack contract. Can you show me how?

Author: x0rc1ph3r

osint.name: The Bird
osint.desc:
warmup/osint
Find the Bird Sanctuary where this type of bird is found.

Redacted GPS Coordinates: LAT: 27.**** LON: 79.**** Note: 👉 The photo is only meant to show the type of bird you are searching for.

Flag format: QnQsec{BirdSanctuary}

Author: blk

osint.name: The Companys Channel 2
osint.desc:
Our Agent has confirmed to us that the company has started using a new channel to sell its products that guarantees end-to-end encrypted conversations, what’s the real email behind the new channel? Flag format: QnQSec{example@gmail.com}

Author: Azadin

osint.name: The Companys Customer
osint.desc:
The company sold one of its services for 90.00$, investigate the customer.

Author: Azadin

osint.name: The Companys Internals
osint.desc:
It's 2025, Our agent confirmed to us that the company is also developing its own AI solutions. What's the internal check code for the company's AI Agent's API ?

Author: Azadin

osint.name: The Companys Money
The Companys Script Kiddie
osint.desc:
What’s the name of the company’s hacker ( the person who’s most likely developing the tools they sell) ? Flag format QnQSec{Firstname Lastname}

Author: Azadin

osint.name: The Companys campaign
osint.desc:
The Company is seeking new AI Research candidates, so the marketing specialist Chloe is taking care of it. investigate the true purpose behind this campaign.

Author: Azadin

osint.name: The Companys channel
osint.desc:
Our agent in the scene told us that the company uses legit websites to offer shady services to its customers. They also have their own website that we couldn’t track down. Your job is to find the website. Flag format : QnQSec{https://example.com}

Author: Azadin

osint.name: The Hidden Castle
osint.desc:
warmup/osint
An old encrypted hard drive was discovered in an abandoned building near a major UNESCO World Heritage Site.

Redacted GPS Coordinates: LAT: 50.**** LON: 19.****

Flag format: QnQsec{nameofcastle}

Author: blk

osint.name: The company
osint.desc:
we stumbled upon this job offer by Chloe Stekar, what's the company that's hiring ? Flag format: QnQSec{Company Name}

Author: Azadin

osint.name: The picture
osint.desc:
What are the exact coordinates of the image the marketing lead Chloe Stekar shared on her account ? Flag format: QnQSec{11.1111, 11.1111}

pwn.name: Debtors Database
pwn.desc:
We managed to exfiltrate an infamous illegal debt collection company's internal tracking application. Is there anything you can do with this?
